title: Meghan's Suits co-star warned her life would 'change forever' when she married into the Royal Family
text:
The Duchess of Sussex was warned by her Suits co-star that her life would be "forever changed" when she married into the Royal Family.

Wendell Pierce, who plays Robert Zane in the US legal drama, has revealed that he reassured Meghan he would always be her friend even if she got swept up in a media circus after her wedding to Prince Harry.

The 55-year-old spoke out on the BBC's Desert Island Discs programme on Radio 4, telling host Lauren Laverne: "I said 'Look, listen, your world is going to be forever changed and no matter where you are, you can always know that you have a friend in me'.

"That was the last time I got to speak to her - and it was great."

Pierce said 38-year-old Meghan was a "really good actress" and "always sweet and kind".

Before she got engaged to Prince Harry, he said he once reminded her to remove a pretend engagement ring she was wearing while shooting scenes for Suits before she left the set to avoid a frenzy of speculation about their relationship.

"We were about to get out of the car and I said 'Don't get out, give us the ring. There's a paparazzi down the street. If a photograph got out with you with a ring on it, it would explode all over the world'," said Pierce.
description: The Duchess of Sussex was warned by her Suits co-star that her life would be "forever changed" when she married into the Royal Family.
